name: The Second Cup
description:
Hot coffee will warm you up this fall

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a cold autumn city, where it is always nice to return to a warm cozy house with hot coffee

This game was made specially for Cozy Autumn Game Jam   

Also we used the optional Jam's palette and the optional Jam's mechanic

#CozyAutumnGameJam2022

Control:
WASD - to walk
Shift - to run
E - to interact 

Monusy - Game designer/3D modeler/artist 

ArtemidiaNn - Sound Designer 

ParPanSs - Programmer
